an4.92:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo labhi hoti ajjhattam cetosamathassa, na labhi adhipannadhammavipassanaya.
an4.92:1.4: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo labhi hoti adhipannadhammavipassanaya, na labhi ajjhattam cetosamathassa.
an4.92:1.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo na ceva labhi hoti ajjhattam cetosamathassa na ca labhi adhipannadhammavipassanaya.
an4.92:1.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo labhi ceva hoti ajjhattam cetosamathassa labhi ca adhipannadhammavipassanaya.
an4.92:1.7: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmin”ti.
